languages.text: "Проклятая музыка. Почему здесь не звучат литании во славу Его?"
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"
languages.original_text: "Проклятая музыка. Почему здесь не звучат литании во славу Его?"

traits.locale_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name?"
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name?"
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead? That would be far more righteous."
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead? That would be far more righteous."
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead? That would be far more righteous."
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"
"Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

languages.text: "Verfluchte Musik. Warum füllen die Astropathen die Luft nicht stattdessen mit Litaneien im Namen des Imperators?"
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

traits.locale_text: "Verfluchte Musik. Warum füllen die Astropathen die Luft nicht stattdessen mit Litaneien im Namen des Imperators?"

languages.text: « Une musique maudite. Pourquoi n'emplissent-ils pas les lieux de litanies en Son nom pour lui faire barrage ? »
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

traits.locale_text: « Une musique maudite. Pourquoi n'emplissent-ils pas les lieux de litanies en Son nom pour lui faire barrage ? »

languages.text: «Una música maldita. ¿Por qué no llenan los Astrópatas el lugar de letanías en Su nombre?».
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

traits.locale_text: «Una música maldita. ¿Por qué no llenan los Astrópatas el lugar de letanías en Su nombre?».

languages.text: 「呪われた音楽。なぜ感応通信官は主の御名による聖歌で、この場所を満たさないの？」
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

traits.locale_text: 「呪われた音楽。なぜ感応通信官は主の御名による聖歌で、この場所を満たさないの？」

languages.text: “这该死的音乐，那些星语者为什么不能让这里响彻祂的礼赞声呢？”
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

traits.locale_text: “这该死的音乐，那些星语者为什么不能让这里响彻祂的礼赞声呢？”

languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"

languages.text: "Lanetli müzik. Astropatlar, burayı neden O'nun ismini okuyan ilahilerle doldurmuyor?"
languages.original_text: "Cursed music. Why do the Astropaths not fill this place with litanies in His name instead?"
